text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump “Nobody could have ever seen something like this coming .... “—Trump, March 25. 

“The possibility of a pandemic is a challenge Donald Trump is unqualified to handle as president. ... The outbreak of a new coronavirus ... will get worse before it gets better.”—Biden, Jan. 29.
